boardgame.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Shadespire
boardgame.description: Warhammer Underworlds is a tactical arena combat game. This is a system designed for balanced, small-scale tactical games that can be played quickly and easily by anyone, but which even experienced players will find challenging to master. The game rules are designed with competitive play in mind; matches can be played in under 45 minutes, on a smaller surface than our larger-scale games, and will be ideal for club or tournament play. And not only that, we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll be fully supporting an organized play system for this game, right from day one._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The forces you can use in this game will be drawn from races across the Mortal Realms, including some for factions that have not received any new miniatures since we first ventured into the Age of Sigmar. Each of these sets will be composed of a small band of easy-to-assemble, push-fit miniatures in the style of our single-pose heroes to represent a specific band of warriors from that faction. These are provided in coloured plastic, and clip together, so you can quite literally be playing with them within minutes of opening the box with no glue or paint needed! (Though they do look great painted, and your dice will roll better _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; probably.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is played using unique dice and card decks, and these will, to an extent, be unique to each faction. Both decks of cards used in the game are fully customisable _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; meaning you can choose to create all manner of combinations of overlapping abilities to use and objectives to achieve. This can be a really rewarding part of the game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and means that even the same faction can be played in wildly different ways. We_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re expecting to see all sorts of combinations tried out at game stores, clubs and in tournaments._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;description from the publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: The khorne mineratures are assembled and the tokens are punched out. Comes with the special games workshop sleeves for both warbands and the stormcast eternal special dice.
Everything from the base game MINUS the miniatures.

Selling the core box and two releases (Sepulchral Guard and Ironskull_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Boyz). Box and all components (cards, mini_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s, counters) are complete and in fantastic condition. Will fit everything into the core box, nicely packaged. All mini_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s are assembled, counters are punched and bagged. Only one mini (Angharad Brightshield) was glued (everyone has trouble assembling that one), all others were just snapped together. Shipping will be at most $13.65 (flat rate), but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll check for lower rates via priority or regular mail (suspect it could be lower, need your zipcode to check).

This include the base game and all 4 released expansions (Dwarf, Orc, Undead, and Skaven). Currently the Humans, Chaos, Dwarf and undead are built, while the Orc and Skeven are still on spru. The Undead are painted very well, the others are not currently painted. Can ship it all in one box, and expect shipping to be between 10-15. Will meet for local pickup, or something like BGG Spring.

Includes Ironskulls Boyz and Sepulchral guard expansions. All minis assembled but unpainted. There is some very minor damage to the Angharad miniature. The hilt on her sword is broken. It is not really noticeable unless you really know what to look for.

Selling my Shadespire collection. Everything is in very good condition, only lightly played. All models built but unpainted. Asking $150 plus shipping (storage case optional). Shipping should be about $20. Includes: * Base game * 4 expansions (Sepulchral Guard, Skaven, Fireslayers, Ironjaws) * 5 sets of dice * alternate art cards and round markers for Stormcast and Khorne * 4 promo cards * Shadespire deck box from store tournament * Acrylic wound markers Pictures in link below: https://m.imgur.com/a/wbocLjo

Core game with all 6 released warbands. Cards all still in shrink. Core bands and Sepulchral Guard have been assembled, and are combined in the core box along with an unassembled Ironskull_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Boyz. Spiteclaw_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Swarm, Chosen Axes, Magore_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Fiends, and Farstriders still new in their own boxes. Ships from 97214.
WH Underworlds: Shadespire Game in like new condition, unplayed. Shrink removed but tokens unpunched, figs on sprues, etc. Postage to UK: £3 Postage to EU: £11.50

This includes the base game, the Orks warband, the Dwarven warband, the Skaven warband, the Undead warband, and several sets of faction dice. Buyer pays $15 shipping for USPS Priority Mail 2-Day delivery with tracking. Smoke free home, played only about 6 times.

Get the WHOLE first season at a great price! This sale includes the base game and all expansions, including the Leader card pack and the second board. Sleeves for all faction packs are also included. Also, the tokens have been upgraded to the acrylic Lithco token set. All was bought new and is in excellent condition. All cards were sleeved when in play; i.e. when I change out cards to modify my deck, the new card is sleeved and the old card goes to the extras section of my box, without a sleeve. All models are assembled but unpainted. They all look good EXCEPT for the Sigmarite _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Bright Shield_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, who, alas, is actually shield-less. I laid that piece aside when it fell mid-game and haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t found it since! She still has her arm in place, and a custom shield could easily be glued there (I was considering using a Nickel). Shoot me a PM if you have any questions.
